abstract: Microsoft Word keeps a list of documents I’ve been recently working on under the File menu. Is there a way to stop this or clear the list?
snippet: Microsoft Word keeps a list of documents I’ve been recently working on under the File menu. Is there a way to stop this or clear the list?
lead_paragraph: Q. Microsoft Word keeps a list of documents I’ve been recently working on under the File menu. Is there a way to stop this or clear the list?
